```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(scales)
library(lubridate)
library(janitor)
```

## Moritz-Ivo Will

```{r}
rm(list = ls())
plant_science <- read_csv("./file.csv") %>% 
  janitor::clean_names() 

plant_science <- plant_science %>% janitor::remove_empty(which = c("rows","cols"))
```

```{r}
summary(plant_science)
```

```{r}
ggplot(plant_science) + geom_line(aes(x=time,y=x1c_par1,col="par1")) +
  geom_smooth(aes(x=time,y=x1c_par1))

ggplot(plant_science) + geom_line(aes(x=time,y=x1c_par2,col="par2")) +
  geom_smooth(aes(x=time,y=x1c_par2))

ggplot(plant_science) + geom_line(aes(x=time,y=x1c_par3,col="par3")) +
  geom_smooth(aes(x=time,y=x1c_par3))

ggplot(plant_science) + geom_line(aes(x=time,y=x1c_par4,col="par4")) +
  geom_smooth(aes(x=time,y=x1c_par4))
```


```{r}
ggplot(plant_science) + geom_point(aes(x=time,y=x1c_t1,col="t1")) +
  geom_smooth(aes(x=time,y=x1c_t1))

ggplot(plant_science) + geom_point(aes(x=time,y=x1c_t2,col="t2")) +
  geom_smooth(aes(x=time,y=x1c_t2))

ggplot(plant_science) + geom_point(aes(x=time,y=x1c_t3,col="t3")) +
  geom_smooth(aes(x=time,y=x1c_t3))

ggplot(plant_science) + geom_point(aes(x=time,y=x1c_t4,col="t4")) +
  geom_smooth(aes(x=time,y=x1c_t4))
```
